messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] List benefits/detriments? (was Re: sharing details of re...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/1/2009 9:32:38 AM Eastern Daylight Time, Sandra@SandraDodd.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/1/2009 9:32:38 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Sandra@... writes:

<<<What kinds of things do you see as disruptions, or do you wish weren't
on the list?>>>



Local stuff that's not labeled clearly in the subject line or under the
subject line of another post is kind of bothersome. It's pretty easy to just
delete stuff that's labeled clearly that I know I don't want to read, but
when I'm in the midst of going through a discussion under a certain subject
heading, one of those is like hitting a speed bump in the middle of a
regular road at 45 mph.

Thanks, too, to everyone who continues to post and answer here, despite
all the repetitious questions-I really appreciate the time you take out to
help folks refine their unschooling and parenting. Thank you for all your
help!

Peace,
De
